channel.title: Welcome Armae! (and sorry)
channel.description:
I'd like to take a minute to come as close as I can to unlocking @Armae's introduction thread.
I apologize that your introduction has had to be drowned out in a large response to a change you suggested and the actions of another dev. You really don't deserve to have either of those define you as a member of the team, so I wanted to make this thread to get back on track.
Welcome to the team, we're glad to have you on board for the wonderful game we call Throne of Lies. :blush:

item.title: Welcome Armae! (and sorry)
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
Glad to have you here, if you were put off by what I said, dont be! It’s just my opinion and means nothing in the scheme of things

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome Armae! (and sorry)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I’d like to take a minute to come as close as I can to unlocking @Armae’s introduction thread.

I apologize that your introduction has had to be drowned out in a large response to a change you suggested and the actions of another dev. You really don’t deserve to have either of those define you as a member of the team, so I wanted to make this thread to get back on track.

Welcome to the team, we’re glad to have you on board for the wonderful game we call Throne of Lies.
